api_list.name: 15.2 取得文章與討論區內容
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hog.p.rapidapi.com/hogApp/v1/forum/getPost"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hog.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
